content: knit with an oversized basket weave stitch larger needles and one 150 gram hank of woolstok worsted this cowl is a quick knit and has great squish appeal experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 150g/370yds 1 hank * size 9 5 5 mm 24 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge * tapestry needle finished measurements * circumference 30 * height 17 color shown * dark chocolate no 1313l
